arts.sum: LiveScore makes its picks for all 10 weekend games as Real Madrid protect their perfect start, while Atletico aim to get their season moving.

arts.ttl: Real Sociedad captain highlights the change that Xabi Alonso has brought in at Real Madrid
arts.sum: On Saturday, Real Madrid return to action in La Liga after a two-week hiatus due to the international break. The Merengues, under the tutelage of new manager Xabi Alonso, will face the toughest challenge of the new season so far as they take on Real Sociedad away at the Reale Arena. arts.ttl: Real Madrid youngster aims to keep his place in the starting XI vs Real Sociedad
arts.sum: With the international break out of the way, Real Madrid return to action on Saturday when they face off against Real Sociedad away at the Reale Arena. The Merengues are currently joint-leaders in La Liga, with three wins in three games, and will be gunning to keep their streak alive with another victory. arts.ttl: Injured Real Madrid midfielder will not make his comeback vs Real Sociedad
arts.sum: Following the international break, Real Madrid will resume their chase for the La Liga title this weekend with a visit to San Sebastian, where they will face Real Sociedad. Leading up to the game, there were hopes that Xabi Alonso might recover some of his injured players in time for the trip.
